title: Introduction to Metamaterial Loss Optimization: Deep Learning and Optical Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory optics and materials science, experience with simple software applications
context.additional_context: Aimed at materials science job seekers, this program focuses on acquiring foundational metamaterial design and optimization skills for practical application

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and loss mechanisms of metamaterials.
Learners can simulate metamaterial structure designs using deep learning-based optimization algorithms.
Learners can analyze loss-reduction strategies in non-periodic structures and propose design improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
